result.reason: Searching session output is a valuable feature for text-based protocols (SSH/Telnet), though technically complex due to the embedded window architecture of Putty.
result.approach: Investigate IPC or window message integration with PuttyNG to retrieve scrollback buffer text. Implement a 'Find' dialog in the main UI that queries the active protocol instance if supported.
